code: export var signIn=function signIn(){return function(dispatch,getState,_ref){var getFirebase=_ref.getFirebase;var firebase=getFirebase();var auth=firebase.auth();var provider=new firebase.auth.GoogleAuthProvider();auth.signInWithPopup(provider).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'LOGIN_SUCCESS',user:auth.currentUser.displayName});}).catch(function(err){dispatch({type:'LOGIN_ERROR'});console.error('login error: '+err.message);});};};export var signOut=function signOut(){return function(dispatch,getState,_ref2){var getFirebase=_ref2.getFirebase;var firebase=getFirebase();var auth=firebase.auth();auth.signOut().then(function(res){dispatch({type:'LOGOUT_SUCCESS'});}).catch(function(err){console.error(err);dispatch({type:'LOGOUT_ERROR'});});};};export var update=function update(user){return function(dispatch,getState,_ref3){var getFirebase=_ref3.getFirebase;dispatch({type:'UPDATE',content:user});};};
